# Celestial Sanctuaries
## Scripture
"And God said, 'Let there be lights in the vault of the sky to separate the day from the night, and let them serve as signs to mark sacred times, and days and years.'" - Genesis 1:14

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we're reminded of God's intentional design in creating celestial sanctuaries â€“ spaces that invite us to pause, reflect, and connect with Him. The rhythms of the universe, marked by the cycles of the moon and the movement of the stars, serve as sacred reminders of God's presence and faithfulness. Just as the Israelites marked sacred times with festivals and rituals, we can find sacred moments in the stillness of the night, under the twinkling lights of the sky.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the celestial wonders above, may our hearts be drawn to the sacred rhythms that govern the universe. Help us to find moments of stillness and reflection, where we can connect with You and mark the sacred times in our lives. May the beauty of the night sky remind us of Your faithful presence, guiding us through the joys and challenges of each day. As we navigate the twists and turns of life, may we find sanctuary in the celestial expanse, and may our spirits be lifted by the signs and wonders that You have ordained. Amen.
